full_output.summary: As a dedicated web development student, my objective is to leverage my passion for coding and creativity to contribute to dynamic projects as a web developer.With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I aim to collaborate with experienced professionals, enhance my skills in responsive design, and build user-centric web solutions.

projects.name: Track For Safe
projects.description: The Purpose of Our App is to Help People in Natural Disasters. Natural Disasters in Many States often cause a lot of hardship to Many People and some of them lose their lives because of it. So we can help such People through this App. At that time Government can Find The Location of People who are in Danger Zone and reach out there to help them using Admin Panel Website. This app can be very helpful to the Government as well as the People.

projects.name: MyPortfolio Website
projects.description: I have built a MyPortfolio website that showcases my work and skills. My site features two essential functionalities: the ability to download my CV and the option to send me a Message to My Email.

experiences.description: During my 15-day summer internship at iCode49 Technolabs Pvt. Ltd., I successfully designed and developed a MyPortfolio website with PHP for the back end.
Internship at CodeQuality Technologies offers hands-on experience in Angular development, sharpening skills through real-world projects and mentorship from industry experts.

full_output.name: Vixit Parmar
